exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a = b -> False} B : Type c : nat f : B -> nat a : B l1, l2 : list B H_perm : permutation l2 l1 IHH_perm : fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l2 c = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l1 c Unable to unify "fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l1 (c + f a)" with "fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l2 (c + f a)".

original: intros B l1 l2 c f H_perm. induction H_perm. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHH_perm. reflexivity. - apply fold_left_permutation. + intros. symmetry. apply Nat.add_comm. + auto.
